title: Didn’t know until it was done
selftext: Dhyaan hi nahi diya yar !!!  160 wala petrol …
comments: Where is this from? What type of Petrol is it?
Could be XP100 - 100 Octane premium petrol by IOCL
Yes, it was XP-100. I didn’t know that it existed until I paid the bill.
Na bhai 160/- per litre. 764 to density hai ..
cleaned_text: didnt know done dhyaan hi nahi diya yar wala petrol
cleaned_selftext: dhyaan hi nahi diya yar wala petrol
cleaned_comments: dukhad type petrol could xp octane premium petrol iocl bhut dard hua bhai yes xp didnt know existed paid bill rs per litre wtf na bhai per litre density hai
